content.description: Start as for the Alcove Problem, but after matching on the sloper, climb straight up on positive holds.
content.location: It shares the same start as The Alcove Problem.

content.description: Start on a good left hand edge under the prow with a right hand on a sloper and a high right foot. Work up the arete and top out.
content.protection: A pad or two, good landing.
content.location: This is the first problem you will see when coming up from the valley towards The Alcove boulders.

content.description: Sit start the far left arête/slab. The crux is the first move. This is essentially a sit start to the Alcove slab problem.
content.location: This ascends the far left arête/slab in the Alcove.

content.description: Sit start with a jug and move up into some good holds. Get a high foot in the starting hold and get yourself over the lip by way of a couple different variations.
content.location: This is not actually in the alcove but right behind it. If you are looking at the Alcove Slab problem, walk to the exact other side of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start with both hands in the seam and move up into some better crimps. Get a hight right foot, make a big move up to a good crimp, and top out.
content.location: This is to the right of Great.

content.description: Climb the easy slab to the left of the harder Alcove Slab problem.
content.location: This is to the left of Alcove Slab.

content.description: Climb slab. Finish on the juggy lip.
content.location: Looking at the Alcove Problem, turn around and it is the line right up the center.

content.description: Start in the corner with hands matched on a feature.  Pull on and go left to a crystally sloper. Next cross right hand all the way over to a really good pinch and bring your left to good crimp above it. Now get a good foot out left (tensiony) and shoot out left for a good cyrstally crimp. Next slap to the lip and move out right for the topout.
content.location: This is the most chalked up problem in the alcove that trends left.

pathTokens: Cavalry Boulder Field aka Gymnasium aka Playground

content.description: The Little alcove has some good problems. One of the best is the Alcove Problem.
